movie.title: Once Upon a Crime...
movie.description_intro: Phoebe and fellow American Julian Peters meet in Rome, find a lost dog, and agree to return it to Monte Carlo to split the five thousand dollar reward. Discovering the dog's owner dead, they panic and become fugitives. Other victims of misfortune also become suspects, as the plot twists and luck and judgment desert everyone.
movie.description_full: Phoebe and fellow American Julian Peters meet in Rome, find a lost dog, and agree to return it to Monte Carlo to split the five thousand dollar reward. Discovering the dog's owner dead, they panic and become fugitives. Other victims of misfortune also become suspects, as the plot twists and luck and judgment desert everyone.

movies.title: Ice Bar
movies.summary: On learning that his father whom he thought was dead is alive and living in Seoul, a boy sells ice blocks to fund the trip to meet him.
movies.description_full: On learning that his father whom he thought was dead is alive and living in Seoul, a boy sells ice blocks to fund the trip to meet him.
movies.synopsis: On learning that his father whom he thought was dead is alive and living in Seoul, a boy sells ice blocks to fund the trip to meet him.

movies.title: The Big Hit
movies.summary: To payoff his second girlfriend's debt, hitman Melvin Smiley undertakes a kidnapping job with his usual associates. In a world of prospective Jewish in-laws and late movie fees, the hitman falls in love with the victim and must settle the score with those out to double-cross him.

movies.title: Joyeuse retraite!
movies.summary: Marilou and Philippe prepare for their future retirement in Portugal. But their daughter separates and a whole procession of solicitations falls on them.
movies.description_full: Marilou and Philippe prepare for their future retirement in Portugal. But their daughter separates and a whole procession of solicitations falls on them.

movies.title: Malena
movies.summary: Malèna is about the peril of a beauty through the eyes of a 12 year old kid named Renato. He experiences three things on the same day, beginning of war, getting a bike and sees the arrival of Malèna in town. Through his eyes, we see the curse of beauty and loneliness of Malena, whose husband is presumed to be dead, and through his soul we see his love for her.
